data.Name: The Huck-A-Bucks
data.Bio: Huck-A-Bucks: Joseph "Lil Joey" Timms (rap vocals); Charles "Ricky" Yancy, Lamont "Ray-Ray" Ray (vocals, percussion); Rob "RJ" Folson, DeCarlos Cunningham, Lorenzo Wiliams (keyboards); Felix Stevenson (drums); Sequan "Quan" Jones (congas, percussion). This group is also being nudged along by a go-go long-timer; the Hucks are managed by Charlie Fenwick, who used to handle Hot, Cold Sweat. Unlike the Groovers, the Hucks emphasize the classic early-'80s go-go sound. Read more on Last.fm
